mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nick, email, phone FROM user WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password};
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user WHERE user_id = #{id};
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user WHERE username LIKE '%' + #{username} + '%';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user ORDER BY user_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (nick, username, password, email, phone) VALUES (#{nick}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone});
